Body: I am new to this AWS IoT, i was able to get/update thing shadows using http api (https://endpoint/things/thingName/shadow)
column10: but i want the list of things created under my account. Documentation provides the way of getting list-things using AWS CLI
column11:
how can i achieve the same using rest-api ?

"

Body: I found a solution for this, first i build up custom sdk for AWS IoT, using this link you can build
column9: i selected AWS.IoT and AWS.IoTData and build a sdk. After importing that sdk to your solution
column10:
you can query like this :

var iot = new AWS.Iot({	            "accessKeyId":"accessKeyId"
column15:
err.stack); // an error occurred else console.log(data); // successful response });

You can find the API documentation here

"

Body: Hey @Chirag, I've been trying with the same code but keep getting this: NetworkingError: Network Failure. A 403 error when hitting https://iot.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/things. Were you able to run this without any issues?
@hernangarcia, Yes, i was able to run this without any issue, you better check your AWS credentials and aws-iot-sdk. 403 is forbidden, so i think there's some issue with credentials only.
